ja532:6.4: bhāradha → bhārata (bj) | bhāratha (sya1ed, sya2ed) | bhāratāti (pts-vp-pli1ed) | bhārabha (mr)
ja532:10.2: Vada taṃ → vara taṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), bhañjamicchasi → bhaññamicchasi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | bhuñjamicchasi (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja532:11.1: Atha vaṅge → atha vā aṅge (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja532:30.1: Kassa bherī mudiṅgā ca → mutiṅgā ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja532:37.1: Hatthi assaratha patti → hatthī assā rathā patti (bj)
ja532:37.3: Samantānupariyanti → samantā anupariyanti (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | samantā anupariyāti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja532:45.1: Atho ḍaṃsā makasā ca → ḍaṃsā ca makasā (bj) | ḍaṃsā ca makasā ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja532:53.1: ca santi → ye vasanti (bj) | ye hi santi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja532:59.6: sopapajjati → so upapajjati (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja532:65.3: Tava paddhacaro → tava paṭṭhacaro (sya1ed, sya2ed) | tava baddhañcaro (pts-vp-pli1ed) | tavupaṭṭhacaro (mr)
ja532:74.3: Bhattucca → bhattu ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | bhattuñca (mr)
ja532:75.2: nappavase → pāvisī (pts-vp-pli1ed), gharā → gharaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ja532:79.1: utumhi nhātāya → utusinātāya (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | utusi nhātāya (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja532:79.2: gabbhassa vokkamo → gabbhassa'vakkamo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja532:91.1: piyavācā ca → piyavācañca (sya1ed, sya2ed) | peyyavāsañ ca (pts-vp-pli1ed) | peyyavajjañca (csp1ed)
ja532:93.1: saṅgahā → saṅgahe (^dn31#56 [Siṅgālasutta/13. Chaddisāpaṭicchādanakaṇḍa]; ^an4.32#1 [32. Saṅgahasutta] tadaṭṭhakathāyo oloketabbā)
ja532:93.2: sammapekkhanti → samavekkhanti (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed ^an4.32#1 [32. Saṅgahasutta])
